data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: I don't like the cold weather. The co__ makes m_ feel ti___, a__ it i_ harder t_ wake u_ in t__ morning. I lo__ warm wea____ in t__ summer, but I don't li__ December, January, and February. I want to go to Los Angeles, because it is always warm there.
data.fullContent: I don't like the cold weather. The cold makes me feel tired, and it is harder to wake up in the morning. I love warm weather in the summer, but I don't like December, January, and February. I want to go to Los Angeles, because it is always warm there.
data.answer: 我不喜欢寒冷的天气。寒冷让我感觉很累，早上很难醒来。我喜欢夏天温暖的天气，但我不喜欢12月、1月和2月。我想去洛杉矶，因为那里总是很暖和。
